comment: His tests can be tricky if you didn't read the chapters. You can't rely on the powerpoints because he take almost everything from the book. He's really nice and pretty chill. He also likes group stuff, so make sure you are ready for that.
Obleton is a great guy. He tells you what will be on his tests so if you do not do well it is completely your fault. He is a very fair grader. His class is fun I would take him!
Professor ObleTONSofhotness is hot. Mmmmmmm really smart and classy, class is nice and sassy, his butt is number one, take professor O for ksu 1101!!!
He is an amazing teacher! Mr.Obleton is such a fair grader and he will drop hints of what is important to study. He does not give a lot of homework. I would definitely recommend him!

Always interested in class, is never boring & is big in class involvement. Makes class fun, and is EXTREMELY fair. Amazing teacher! Test? Fair as long you study! Always there if you need help, very easy to talk to! I highly recommend him!
